pkgmetadata.longdescription: Transformation Trees and Forests // Recursive partytioning of transformation models with corresponding random forest for conditional transformation models as described in 'Transformation Forests' (Hothorn and Zeileis, 2017, arXiv:1701.02110) and 'Top-Down Transformation Choice' (Hothorn, 2018, DOI:10.1177/1471082X17748081).
